Transformation.Code: SELECT i.tid || '|' || ip.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK1' || i.inprocid AS articleid, title, vol AS volume, num AS number, pages, month, year, 'SK2' || i.inprocid AS refkey, note, 'SK3' || i.inprocid AS remarks, 'SK4' || i.inprocid AS refs, 'SK5' || i.inprocid AS xxxrefs, 'SK6' || i.inprocid AS fullxxxrefs, 'SK7' || i.inprocid AS oldkey, 'SK8' || i.inprocid AS abstract, 'SK9' || i.inprocid AS preliminary FROM source.inproceedings ANNOT('M1') i, source.inprocpublished ANNOT('M1') ip, source.author ANNOT('M1') a WHERE i.inprocid=ip.inprocid AND ip.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT at.tid || '|' || ap.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK11' || at.articleid AS articleid, title, vol AS volume, num AS number, pages, month, year, 'SK12' || at.articleid AS refkey, note, 'SK13' || at.articleid AS remarks, 'SK14' || at.articleid AS refs, 'SK15' || at.articleid AS xxxrefs, 'SK16' || at.articleid AS fullxxxrefs, 'SK17' || at.articleid AS oldkey, 'SK18' || at.articleid AS abstract, 'SK19' || at.articleid AS preliminary FROM source.article ANNOT('M2') at, source.articlepublished ANNOT('M2') ap, source.author ANNOT('M2') a WHERE at.articleid=ap.articleid AND ap.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT t.tid || '|' || tp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK21' || t.techid AS articleid, title, vol AS volume, num AS number, pages, month, year, 'SK22' || t.techid AS refkey, note, 'SK23' || t.techid AS remarks, 'SK24' || t.techid AS refs, 'SK25' || t.techid AS xxxrefs, 'SK26' || t.techid AS fullxxxrefs, 'SK27' || t.techid AS oldkey, 'SK28' || t.techid AS abstract, 'SK29' || t.techid AS preliminary FROM source.techreport ANNOT('M3') t, source.techpublished ANNOT('M3') tp, source.author ANNOT('M3') a WHERE t.techid=tp.techid AND tp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT b.tid || '|' || bp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK31' || b.bookid AS articleid, title, vol AS volume, num AS number, pages, month, year, 'SK32' || b.bookid AS refkey, note, 'SK33' || b.bookid AS remarks, 'SK34' || b.bookid AS refs, 'SK35' || b.bookid AS xxxrefs, 'SK36' || b.bookid AS fullxxxrefs, 'SK37' || b.bookid AS oldkey, 'SK38' || b.bookid AS abstract, 'SK39' || b.bookid AS preliminary FROM source.book ANNOT('M4') b, source.bookpublished ANNOT('M4') bp, source.author ANNOT('M4') a WHERE b.bookid=bp.bookid AND bp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT i.tid || '|' || ip.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK41' || i.colid AS articleid, title, vol AS volume, num AS number, pages, month, year, 'SK42' || i.colid AS refkey, note, 'SK43' || i.colid AS remarks, 'SK44' || i.colid AS refs, 'SK45' || i.colid AS xxxrefs, 'SK46' || i.colid AS fullxxxrefs, 'SK47' || i.colid AS oldkey, 'SK48' || i.colid AS abstract, 'SK49' || i.colid AS preliminary FROM source.incollection ANNOT('M5') i, source.incollpublished ANNOT('M5') ip, source.author ANNOT('M5') a WHERE i.colid=ip.colid AND ip.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT m.tid || '|' || mp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK51' || m.miscid AS articleid, title, vol AS volume, num AS number, pages, month, year, 'SK52' || m.miscid AS refkey, note, 'SK53' || m.miscid AS remarks, 'SK54' || m.miscid AS refs, 'SK55' || m.miscid AS xxxrefs, 'SK56' || m.miscid AS fullxxxrefs, 'SK57' || m.miscid AS oldkey, 'SK58' || m.miscid AS abstract, 'SK59' || m.miscid AS preliminary FROM source.misc ANNOT('M6') m, source.miscpublished ANNOT('M6') mp, source.author ANNOT('M6') a WHERE m.miscid=mp.miscid AND mp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT m.tid || '|' || mp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK61' || m.manid AS articleid, title, vol AS volume, num AS number, pages, month, year, 'SK62' || m.manid AS refkey, note, 'SK63' || m.manid AS remarks, 'SK64' || m.manid AS refs, 'SK65' || m.manid AS xxxrefs, 'SK66' || m.manid AS fullxxxrefs, 'SK67' || m.manid AS oldkey, 'SK68' || m.manid AS abstract, 'SK69' || m.manid AS preliminary FROM source.manual ANNOT('M7') m, source.manualpublished ANNOT('M7') mp, source.author ANNOT('M7') a WHERE m.manid=mp.manid AND mp.authid = a.authid

SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.inproceedings ANNOT('M1') i, source.inprocpublished ANNOT('M1') ip, source.author ANNOT('M1') a WHERE i.inprocid=ip.inprocid AND ip.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.article ANNOT('M2') at, source.articlepublished ANNOT('M2') ap, source.author ANNOT('M2') a WHERE at.articleid=ap.articleid AND ap.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.techreport ANNOT('M3') t, source.techpublished ANNOT('M3') tp, source.author ANNOT('M3') a WHERE t.techid=tp.techid AND tp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.book ANNOT('M4') b, source.bookpublished ANNOT('M4') bp, source.author ANNOT('M4') a WHERE b.bookid=bp.bookid AND bp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.incollection ANNOT('M5') i, source.incollpublished ANNOT('M5') ip, source.author ANNOT('M5') a WHERE i.colid=ip.colid AND ip.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.misc ANNOT('M6') m, source.miscpublished ANNOT('M6') mp, source.author ANNOT('M6') a WHERE m.miscid=mp.miscid AND mp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.manual ANNOT('M7') m, source.manualpublished ANNOT('M7') mp, source.author ANNOT('M7') a WHERE m.manid=mp.manid AND mp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT a.tid AS tid, a.authid AS authorid, name AS name FROM source.author ANNOT('M8') a

SELECT i.tid || '|' || ip.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK1' || i.inprocid AS articleid, a.authid AS authorid FROM source.inproceedings ANNOT('M1') i, source.inprocpublished ANNOT('M1') ip, source.author ANNOT('M1') a WHERE i.inprocid=ip.inprocid AND ip.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT at.tid || '|' || ap.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK11' || at.articleid AS articleid, a.authid AS authorid FROM source.article ANNOT('M2') at, source.articlepublished ANNOT('M2') ap, source.author ANNOT('M2') a WHERE at.articleid=ap.articleid AND ap.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT t.tid || '|' || tp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK21' || t.techid AS articleid, a.authid AS authorid FROM source.techreport ANNOT('M3') t, source.techpublished ANNOT('M3') tp, source.author ANNOT('M3') a WHERE t.techid=tp.techid AND tp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT b.tid || '|' || bp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK31' || b.bookid AS articleid, a.authid AS authorid FROM source.book ANNOT('M4') b, source.bookpublished ANNOT('M4') bp, source.author ANNOT('M4') a WHERE b.bookid=bp.bookid AND bp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT i.tid || '|' || ip.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK41' || i.colid AS articleid, a.authid AS authorid FROM source.incollection ANNOT('M5') i, source.incollpublished ANNOT('M5') ip, source.author ANNOT('M5') a WHERE i.colid=ip.colid AND ip.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT m.tid || '|' || mp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK51' || m.miscid AS articleid, a.authid AS authorid FROM source.misc ANNOT('M6') m, source.miscpublished ANNOT('M6') mp, source.author ANNOT('M6') a WHERE m.miscid=mp.miscid AND mp.authid = a.authid UNION SELECT m.tid || '|' || mp.tid || '|' || a.tid AS tid, 'SK61' || m.manid AS articleid, a.authid AS authorid FROM source.manual ANNOT('M7') m, source.manualpublished ANNOT('M7') mp, source.author ANNOT('M7') a WHERE m.manid=mp.manid AND mp.authid = a.authid
